item.title: Report E-2025010210
item.description:
Report E-2025010210

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-15
  • City: YEMASSEE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 15, 2025, one (1) 1-gallon pail of UN1760 was damaged and released approximately two (2) cups of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remove all product. All absorbents and the damaged pail were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
